name: test_e2e_with_logs[089_XSS_BYPASS_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_010` |
| **Name** | Meta refresh redirect |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<meta http-equiv='refresh' content='0;url=javascript:alert(1)'>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D'refresh'%20content%3D'0%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert(1)'%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:05.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_BYPASS_010-1767433325894-1tsyc8 pattern_id=XSS_BYPASS_010 uri=/?q=%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D'refresh'%20content%3D'0%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert(1)'%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:42:05.000000000: Critical [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_BYPASS_010-1767433325894-1tsyc8 pattern_id=XSS_BYPASS_010 uri=/?q=%3Cmeta%20http-equiv%3D'refresh'%20content%3D'0%3Burl%3Djavascript%3Aalert(1)'%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
